amendment.description: An amendment numbered 53 printed in House Report 115-830 to place a funding limitation on the EPA's ability to utilize the Title 42 special pay authority.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burgess amendment (A049) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A049) offered by Mr. Burgess.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Burgess amendment (A049) Agreed to by voice vote.
